BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.ROM.File.asyncROMFile
BlackBox.type:
asyncROMFile :: (KnownNat k, KnownNat m) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
              => SNat n                   -- sz,   ARG[2]
              -> FilePath                 -- file, ARG[3]
              -> Unsigned k               -- rd,   ARG[4]
              -> BitVector m

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.ROM.File.romFile'
BlackBox.type:
romFile' :: (KnownNat m, KnownNat k)  -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
          => SClock clk                -- clk,  ARG[2]
          -> SNat n                    -- sz,   ARG[3]
          -> FilePath                  -- file, ARG[4]
          -> Signal' clk (Unsigned k)  -- rd,   ARG[5]
          -> Signal' clk (BitVector m)
